label: Interviewee: Hesitation, Consideration, Contextualizing, Body Language (smile, looking off, grimace), Relating Firsthand Experience

body.value: As I later found out when I got to LA and started...spending more time with Félix and Frank, there was a group of Latinos in journalism. *pausing to remember* Frank del Olmo. Félix Gutiérrez was already doing some newspaper work, but mostly heading towards education. Henry Alfaro. Frank Cruz. Joel...I can't remember Joel's – he was, he gets credit for being the biggest instigator of Chicano news media. I can't remember his last name. *sheepish smile*
